News.headline: Subscribe to Daggers Player Now!
News.short_description: Daggers Player subscriptions available get an Access All Areas pass from Just Â£4.49
News.description:
Subscribe to Daggers Player now to get exclusive Dagenham & Redbridge content online, on your tablet and on your mobile.

To keep up to date with up and coming fixtures, injuries

With Exclusive content such as:
  • Interviews with players and manager during the week and post match
  • Exclusive extended highlights from all Dagenham & Redbridge games
  • PlayerHD Live audio commentary and live updates from the Premier League to the National League

With three passes available to Daggers Player monthly, Annually by direct debit or one off payment annually.
